item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: One of the coolest things I did during my education was implement a controller for an inverted pendulum. See the following video. There was only one problem. While I implementd the controller to control the inverted pendulum, I did not derive the model. That was given to me by my instructor. Even though implementing the controller was cool, it was somewhat unsatisfying. After all, I really had no idea how the model was derived.
